definition: variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album

sentences.english: Sylar is hurt. Did Claire do it?
sentences.chinese: 塞拉受伤。是克莱尔干的？

sentences.english: Poor Clare Nuns attempted to repair this damage with patches.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的克莱尔修会修女尝试去修复这个肖像。

sentences.english: Claire Bowes reports on the sinking of the Rainbow Warrior.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔鲍伊斯在“彩虹勇士号”的沉船处为您报道。

sentences.english: Claire opened the front door, letting in a cool summery breeze.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔打开了前门，放进些凉爽的夏日的微风。

sentences.english: The shock of the icy air ended Claire's torpor .
sentences.chinese: 一种冰凉的寒风使克莱尔从麻木状况中恢复过来。

sentences.english: Clare is wearing a wine-colored velvet dress andpearls.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔穿着酒红色的天鹅绒连衣裙，戴着耳环。

sentences.english: You see that one?The widow St. Clair?
sentences.chinese: 你看见那个人了吗，那是圣克莱尔夫人。

sentences.english: He crashed into the room screaming at Clare like all get out.
sentences.chinese: 他一头冲进房间，朝克莱尔歇斯底里地大叫大嚷。

sentences.english: Ellen Pompeo following the teachings of Klein in front of a movie-magic green screen.
sentences.chinese: 电影幻绿屏前艾伦旁派在克莱尔的指导下演示。
克莱尔显得有些尴尬“不好意思，是我心急了。

sentences.english: In the picture Clare is looking out serenely overLighthouse Beach.
sentences.chinese: 在照片上，克莱尔正安静的看着远处沙滩上的灯塔。

sentences.english: When Claire got home, she wept with anger in her armchair.
sentences.chinese: 克莱尔回到家里，坐在扶手椅里气得直哭。

sentences.english: Lini stopped coughing and Claire freed her mouth.
sentences.chinese: 林妮停止咳嗽，克莱尔也就松开了她的嘴巴。
